However, it is pointed out that the user experience of our Offer can be limited then.

This data is used alone for evidence in the case that a third party abused an e-mail address and logs in without the knowledge of the person entitled to receive the newsletter.
Your consent to the storage of the data, the email address and its use for sending the newsletter can be revoked at any time. The revocation can be made via a link in the newsletters themselves or by notice via email to us.

Our Offer is a general audience App, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from minors under the age of 16 or under the applicable age limit (in some jurisdictions, this age limit may be lower). If you are a parent of a child under the Age Limit and become aware that your child has provided personal information to our Offer, please contact us and report it at support@yeay.com and you may request an exercise of your applicable access, rectification, cancellation, and/or objection rights. Please note, that creating an account with false information about your age is a violation of our Terms and Conditions.

Our Offer protects all user data, personal and non-personal, to the highest degree possible. All the communication between the client app and backend servers are done through HTTPS (HTTP over SSL/TLS). Our servers and the Android and iOS apps communicate with partners only using the official client library that uses HTTPS.
